item.title: 苹果在 WWDC 大会上发布 Liquid Glass 软件界面
item.description: 苹果公司在其年度全球开发者大会上发布了名为 Liquid Glass 的新操作系统界面，称这是该公司有史以来最广泛的设计更新。【原文：Apple Inc. unveiled a new operating system interface called Liquid Glass at its annual Worldwide Developers Conference, calling it the company’s broadest design update ever.】

item.title: 据说 GFL 考虑出售 50 亿加元基础设施部门的股份
item.description: 据知情人士透露，GFL 环境公司正在考虑出售其基础设施部门的股份，这可能是加拿大今年最大的基础设施交易之一。【原文：GFL Environmental Inc. is considering the sale of a stake in its infrastructure arm, people with knowledge of the matter said, in what could be one of Canada’s largest infrastructure deals this year.】

item.title: Trafigura 改组美国交易团队
item.description: Trafigura 集团正在重组其美国交易团队的管理层，长期担任石油交易主管的 Corey Prologo 将担任该公司美国主要部门主席的新职务。【原文：Trafigura Group is reorganizing the management of its trading team in the US, with long-time oil trading chief Corey Prologo set to step into a new role as chair of the company’s main American unit.】

item.title: 电子邮件遭黑客攻击后，银行业组织敦促美国财政部提高安全性
item.description: 金融行业贸易团体敦促美国财政部加强网络安全，以应对黑客截获 100 多名银行监管人员的敏感电子邮件长达一年多的事件。【原文：Financial-sector trade groups are urging the US Treasury Department to bolster its cybersecurity in response to hackers intercepting the sensitive emails of more than 100 bank regulators for more than a year.】

item.title: 比特币反弹意味着所有策略购买都能获利
item.description: 比特币在过去几个交易日的小幅反弹，使得迈克尔-赛勒的 "策略 "在过去四年多时间里购买的每一笔加密货币都有利可图。【原文：The mini rally in Bitcoin over the past few trading sessions has made every purchase of the cryptocurrency by Michael Saylor’s Strategy over the last four plus years profitable.】

item.title: 瑞典 "Vibe Coding "初创公司 Lovable 正洽谈 15 亿美元估值事宜
item.description: Lovable是一家简化软件开发的人工智能初创公司，它正在洽谈一轮大额融资，这将使它成为欧洲最大的人工智能新公司之一。【原文：Lovable, an AI startup that streamlines software development, is in talks for a large funding round that would make it one of Europe’s biggest artificial intelligence newcomers.】

item.title: 摩根大通将 2025 年小额债券销售额预测上调至 5600 亿美元
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. raised its forecast for 2025 municipal bond issuance by 14% as state and local governments step up borrowing efforts.】

item.title: 特斯拉零售大军不畏马斯克与特朗普之争，ETF下注创纪录
item.description: 上周，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的身家暴跌 360 亿美元，特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：As Elon Musk’s fortune plunged by $36 billion last week and Tesla Inc.’s stock suffered a brutal drubbing, his most ardent backers rushed in to buy the dip — with leverage.】

item.title: 苹果 WWDC 主题演讲更新
item.description: 加利福尼亚州核桃溪的一家苹果专卖店。摄影师：大卫-保罗-莫里斯/布鲁姆伯格【原文：An Apple store in Walnut Creek, California. Photographer: David Paul Morris/Bloomberg】

item.title: 鸡蛋实际价格的惊人逆转
item.description:
进度倒退

【原文：

Progress going backwards

】

item.title: 联合天然食品公司网络安全事件影响订单
item.description: 美国联合天然食品公司周一在提交给美国证券交易委员会的一份文件中表示，该公司已将部分系统下线，同时在外部网络安全帮助下调查 "未经授权的活动"。【原文：United Natural Foods Inc. has taken some of its systems offline while it investigates “unauthorized activity” with outside cybersecurity help, it said Monday in a filing with the US Securities and Exchange Commission.】

item.title: 关税恐慌来袭，黄金交易银行获利 5 亿美元
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）和摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）等顶级银行的贵金属交易员在第一季度取得了五年来的最佳业绩，部分原因是套利机会引发了金银涌入美国。【原文：Precious metals traders at top banks including JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Morgan Stanley posted their best performance in five years in the first quarter, in part thanks to an arbitrage opportunity that sparked a rush of bullion into the US.】

item.title: Pump.Fun 10 亿美元代币销售引发对 Memecoin 流通性的担忧
item.description: Pump.fun决定融资10亿美元，这引发了人们的担忧：最受欢迎的memecoins创建平台进行代币销售，有可能将需求从每天通过网站发行的数百种硬币中抽走。【原文：Pump.fun’s decision to raise $1 billion is sparking concern that a token sale by the most popular platform for creating memecoins risks siphoning demand away from the hundreds of coins issued daily through the website.】

item.title: 南非赢得世界银行 15 亿美元基础设施贷款
item.description: 世界银行批准了一笔 15 亿美元的贷款，用于支持旨在促进南非基础设施建设的结构性改革。【原文：The World Bank has approved a $1.5 billion loan to support structural reforms aimed at boosting South Africa’s infrastructure.】

item.title: 澳大利亚将首次公开募股流程缩短一周以吸引企业上市
item.description: 澳大利亚证券投资委员会（Australian Securities Investment Commission）将开始测试一种更简化的本地首次公开募股程序，以鼓励更多公司在澳大利亚上市。【原文：The Australian Securities Investment Commission will begin testing a more streamlined process for local initial public offerings to encourage more companies to list in the country.】

item.title: 中美贸易谈判在伦敦拉开帷幕，美国股市随之波动
item.description: 周一，美国股市在小幅上涨和下跌之间徘徊，投资者在等待华盛顿和北京在伦敦举行的重要贸易谈判的结果。【原文：US stocks flipped between small gains and losses on Monday as investors awaited the outcome of crucial trade talks between Washington and Beijing in London.】

item.title: Clearlake 从 KKR 聘请莱德曼担任资本市场主管
item.description: 据 Clearlake Capital Group 发言人称，该公司从 KKR & Co.公司聘请 Josh Lederman 担任新设立的资本市场主管一职。【原文：Clearlake Capital Group hired Josh Lederman from KKR & Co. for the newly created role of head of capital markets, according to a spokesperson for the firm.】

item.title: 立场转变后，印度央行将停止每日注资
item.description: 印度央行表示将停止每天向金融系统注资，此前几天，印度货币当局转变了政策立场，并表示未来宽松的空间受到限制。【原文：India’s central bank said it will stop daily fund injections into the financial system, days after the monetary authority shifted its policy stance and said the space for future easing was constrained.】

item.title: 安大略省自 2011 年以来首次放弃美国银行参与扬基债券销售
item.description: 安大略省近 14 年来首次将美国银行排除在美元债券销售之外，选择巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）作为其外国银行帮助管理 20 亿美元的债务发行。【原文：Ontario left American banks out of a US-dollar bond sale for the first time in almost 14 years, choosing Barclays Plc as its foreign bank to help manage a $2 billion debt issue.】

item.title: 应届毕业生加入多年来最糟糕的初级就业市场
item.description:
随着公司冻结招聘，以及人工智能使一些技能较低的职位被淘汰，2025 届学生发现很多大门已经关闭。【原文：

As companies freeze hiring and AI makes some less-skilled roles obsolete, the Class of 2025 is finding a lot of doors are closed.

】

item.title: 美银美林认为沙特将展开长期但浅层次的油价战争
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp. ）大宗商品研究部主管表示，欧佩克+提高石油产量是沙特战略的一部分，沙特将开始一场长期但浅层次的价格战，旨在夺回市场份额。【原文：OPEC+’s oil-output hikes are part of a Saudi strategy that will see the kingdom embark on a long but shallow price war designed to recapture market share, Bank of America Corp.’s head of commodities research said.】

item.title: 自 2022 年末以来，ESG 基金表现最长时间超过 S&P 500 指数
item.description: 自 2022 年末以来，注重环境、社会和公司治理的基金在最长时期内跑赢了 S&P 500 指数的表现。【原文：ESG-focused funds are beating the performance of the S&P 500 Index for the longest period since late 2022.】

item.title: Moelis 银行家称，由于规模和复杂性，英国石油公司的收购将是一个漫长的过程
item.description: Moelis & Co.公司的银行家们表示，由于英国石油公司的规模和复杂性，即使同行们一直在进行数字计算，竞争对手收购英国石油公司的可能性现在也很小。【原文：The chances that a rival oil company will take over BP Plc are slim right now, even as peers have been running the numbers, because of the firm’s size and complexity, said bankers from Moelis & Co.】

item.title: 惠而浦被降至 "垃圾 "级后计划出售 12 亿美元债券
item.description: 惠而浦公司（Whirlpool Corp. ）正寻求筹集 12 亿美元为债务再融资，这是该公司自评级被降至垃圾级以来首次出售债券。【原文：Whirlpool Corp. is looking to raise $1.2 billion to refinance debt, in its first bond sale since being downgraded to junk.】

item.title: 特朗普恩怨余波未平，特斯拉评级连遭下调
item.description: 分析师警告说，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的电动汽车公司正面临着高度不确定的前景，尤其是在政治方面。【原文：Tesla Inc. received a pair of downgrades on Monday, with analysts warning that Elon Musk’s electric-vehicle company is facing a highly uncertain outlook, especially on the political front.】

item.title: 里夫斯的开支计划将使伦敦的基础设施建设落空
item.description: 在英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）周三公布的支出审查报告中，伦敦将无法获得用于新基础设施项目的额外资金，这引发了财政部与伦敦市长萨迪克-汗（Sadiq Khan）之间在最后一刻的争吵。【原文：London is set to miss out on extra funding for new infrastructure projects in Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves’ spending review on Wednesday, provoking an eleventh-hour row between the Treasury and the capital’s mayor, Sadiq Khan.】

item.title: 墨西哥通胀率超预期，突破目标区间上限
item.description: 在央行宽松周期和经济放缓的背景下，墨西哥 5 月份通胀加速超过预期，突破了目标区间的上限。【原文：Mexico’s inflation accelerated more than expected in May, breaching the top of the target range amid a central bank easing cycle and an economic slowdown.】

item.title: 医疗技术公司 Caris Life Sciences 寻求 IPO 筹资 4.235 亿美元
item.description: 利用技术帮助诊断和治疗癌症的医疗保健公司 Caris Life Sciences Inc.【原文：Caris Life Sciences Inc., a health-care company that uses technology to help diagnose and treat cancer, is seeking to raise $423.5 million in an initial public offering.】

item.title: 金融家莱克斯-格林希尔谴责围绕软银交易的 "沉默法则
item.description: 金融家莱克斯-格林希尔（Lex Greensill）在其公司高调倒闭后首次公开出庭，称与软银集团公司的一系列交易存在 "沉默法则"，以掩盖潜在的损失。【原文：Financier Lex Greensill said there was a “code of silence” around a series of transactions with SoftBank Group Corp. to keep potential losses hidden, in his first public court appearance since the high profile collapse of his firm.】

item.title: 佛罗里达州保险公司下滑，支持者寻求通过首次公开募股融资 3.4 亿美元
item.description: Slide Insurance Holdings Inc. 及其部分投资者正寻求在首次公开募股中筹集 3.4 亿美元，这可能使其市值高达 21.2 亿美元。【原文：Slide Insurance Holdings Inc. and some of its investors are seeking to raise $340 million in an initial public offering, which could give it a market value of as much as $2.12 billion.】
